name: Joel Gets Meaner Every Day + Pepsiman: The Forbidden Drink
name_original: Joel Gets Meaner Every Day + Pepsiman: The Forbidden Drink
description:
whoa. its that garbage you've seen once on stream.

wow.

it's even worse when you play it.

oh.

anyway.

includes two games i've made for Joel twitch.tv/vargskelethor just because

Joel Gets Meaner Every Day - a game that was made because Joel said "haha make me a slender clone chat :) " so i did. It took like 8 hours so it's buggy garbage and i don't want to fix it because it's a meme game.

Pepsi man: The Forbidden Drink - a game that was made because Joel said "haha chat make a pepsiman fangame :)" so i did. It took like 5 hours so it's buggy garbage and i don't want to fix it because it's a meme game.

With my own actual projects i always fix the stuff, that is if i don't lose passion and all that jazz.

anyway.

have fun with this trash. (if that's even possible)

for some reason you all wanted it so, it's here.

bla bla bla, i don't own the memes, bla bla bla, i don't own the music or videos in the games and yadda yadda.

so like, don't sue me. and dont make Vinny play these games. I am telling it to you, "meme crusty pack makers".

it won't be "haha wouldn't it be fanny :)" cause those were made for Joel and his chat. so.

bye.
